solution_line_template: It will take {drive_time_minutes} minutes to drive to the airport and {park_time_minutes} minutes to park so that's {drive_time_minutes}+{park_time_minutes} = <<{drive_time_minutes}+{park_time_minutes}={total_travel_minutes}>>{total_travel_minutes} minutes (1 hour)

They need to check in {recommended_check_in_hours} hours early and it will {total_travel_hours} hour to drive there and park so that's {recommended_check_in_hours}+{total_travel_hours} = <<{recommended_check_in_hours}+{total_travel_hours}={total_time_needed_hours}>>{total_time_needed_hours} hours

Their flight leaves at {flight_departure_hour}:00 pm and it will take {total_time_needed_hours} hours to drive there and check in so the latest they can leave is {flight_departure_hour}-{total_time_needed_hours} = <<{flight_departure_hour}-{total_time_needed_hours}={latest_departure_hour}>>{latest_departure_hour}:00 pm
